title: Instruction Set Architecture (ISA)
subject: Computer Organization
theory:
Interface between Hardware and Software. 
Set of commands processor understands (e.g., x86, ARM, MIPS). 
Includes Data Types, Instructions, Registers, Modes.

examples.code: ADD R1, R2, R3  // R1 = R2 + R3

real_world_use_cases.description: Android uses ARM ISA. PC uses x86 ISA. Binaries incompatible.
